name: setup-db
description: Creates or replaces a database and collection and sets it up with a schema and indexes.

scripts.setup: npm install && tsc && mongo $CONN --eval "let args={connectionString: '$CONN', databaseName: '$DB', collectionName: '$COLL', schemaPath: '$SCHEMA', indexesPath: '$INDEXES'}" dist/index.js
scripts.setup-cases: npm install && tsc && mongo --eval "let args={databaseName: 'covid19', collectionName: 'cases', schemaPath: './schemas/cases.schema.json', indexesPath: './schemas/cases.indexes.json'}" dist/index.js
scripts.setup-restricted-cases: npm install && tsc && mongo --eval "let args={databaseName: 'covid19', collectionName: 'restrictedcases', schemaPath: './schemas/cases.schema.json', indexesPath: './schemas/cases.indexes.json'}" dist/index.js
scripts.setup-sources: npm install && tsc && mongo --eval "let args={databaseName: 'covid19', collectionName: 'sources', schemaPath: './schemas/sources.schema.json', indexesPath: './schemas/sources.schema.json'}" dist/index.js
